ActorTalk: Hi. We're investigating a case and need your cooperation.
Of course. If I can be of help to [PlayerName], it would be our honor.
Is there any kind of facility or passage under your store?
Facilities... Oh! This place used to be a two-story warehouse owned by a company. They later rented out the ground floor to us for the bar.
Since then, the lower level has been sealed off and basically abandoned. No one's gone down there in ages.
We need to take a look downstairs. Can you open the door?
No problem. I've got the physical key. No one ever came to claim it, so I've been holding onto it. Please, follow me.
